author: Andreas
content:
Well, those guys move in the wind. It does not even need much wind at all. The 2.8 version had the focus a tad too far behind. The 5.6 version nailed the focus, but the background was far more busy. Combining fixed both.

No, the two exposures have the same EV. I got the tones by using a b+w conversion adjustment layer with strong blue filter and multiplying the result. There's also a gradient map involved, my usual toning, but dialed back to 50%.
